short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jet Assistant is a browser extension that helps you learn faster and more efficiently in JetLearn Classes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JetAssistant – Simplify Your Child’s Learning Journey!

Enhance your JetLearn experience with our all-new Chrome extension, designed to keep you informed and organized with just a click. Stay on top of your child’s classes and access essential features with ease.

Key Features:
Next Class Details
Quickly check the schedule for your child’s next class, including course name, date, and time.

Course Progress Overview
Keep track of the total classes completed and monitor your child’s learning milestones.

Easy Access to Class Links
No more searching for emails! Join classes directly from the extension with one click.

Invite Friends
Share the gift of learning! Effortlessly invite friends to join JetLearn and be part of an exciting educational community.

Support Tab
Have questions or need assistance? Access our dedicated support section directly through the extension for a seamless experience.

Why Install the JetAssistant?
Save time and stay organized with this powerful tool that makes it easier than ever to manage your JetLearn schedule, engage with the platform, and invite others to join the fun.
